#summary a guide for installing lncRScan.

= Introduction =

This is a guide for installing lncRScan.

= OS requirement=
Unix/Linux

= Steps =

<li>Download "lncrscan" which contains three folders to your home directory _MY_DIR_.

<code>
svn checkout http://lncrscan.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ lncrscan-read-only
</code>

<li>Set environmental variables on your OS by modifying _.bashrc_

<code>
export PATH=$PATH:/MY_DIR/scripts
export PERL5LIB=$PERL5LIB:/MY_DIR/lib
source .bashrc
</code>

<li>Make all scripts executable by 

<code>
chmod 0775 /MY_DIR/scripts/*
</code>
